text: (pana udura gænimata) malayikavarun ovun veta pæminima ho nætahot oba deviyange (danduvama) pæminima ho nætahot obage sadhakayangen samaharak pæminima ho misa, (vena kisivak) ovun balaporottu vannehuda? oba deviyange sadhakayan pæminena (avasana) dinadi, pera visvasa nokara sita, nætahot visvasa kara sitiyadida kisima honda kriyavak nokara sitimen anaturuva (edina) ovun tabana visvasaya kisima prayojanayak at kara denne næta. ebævin (ovunta “ema visala sadhakayan) obat balaporottuven sitinu. niyata vasayenma apit balaporottuven sitinnemu” yayi (nabiye!) oba pavasanu mænava
